message.entry: Function called when submitting independent jobs
XML job description file to use when creating jobs
Function that runs on the client when job reaches the finished state
Function that runs on the client when job reaches the queued state
Function that runs on the client when job reaches the running state
Folder where job data is stored on the client
Name of the job template to use for jobs submitted to HPC Server
License number (Optional: Used only if this cluster uses online licensing)
License number (Optional: Used only if this cluster uses MathWorks hosted license manager)
The name of the MATLAB Job Scheduler. (Required if multiple schedulers on the host machine)
Maximum number of times that a job will try to run again if it fails
Number of computational threads to use on each worker
Number of workers available to cluster
